I've been lurking around for those wondering. Megatron is waiting in 
the control room for the Predacons, most of which are 'busy' or 
something. I really don't have much to post about right now, but I 
still have to read the posts up till when i last checked em.

I guess i have to stick my nose in, cause this obviously aint 
getting better, it's getting worse. *raises verbal shields*

First think that needs to happen is a cease fire in this flame war 
between cardhead, lurker, and narrator. it started wrong right from 
the start. certain things which shouldn't have been said, were said, 
and the replies were less than sucessful at defusing the situation 
and it blew up. 

cardhead, if you don't like Narrator's posting style, that's your 
problem. Telling him that you don't like it, with a bunch of 
senseless slander isn't going to make him post the way you'd like 
him to post.

Narrator, keep ooc comments out of your posting, if you want to say 
something, say it and no pot shots. And I find it really hard to 
believe that you managed to put 'piece of dog shit' and 'grow up' in 
the same context.

If anyone wants to grow up, then they should shut up about this 
stupid arguement, and get back to role playing. Nothing anyone can 
say now short of an appologies and 'I'm being quiet', can show me 
that anyone is growing up.

*preps for backlash*

> BULL-FUCKING-SHIT YOU HAVE.  I'm 20 - I've been into Transformers 
as

this 
> RPG.

I've
